Detailed Description

Use dot product between two vectors as distance metric.

Definition at line 57 of file SpectClust.h.

Member Function Documentation

double DistanceMetric::dist ( const Matrix &  M,
int  col1Ix,
int  col2Ix 
) const [virtual]

Compute a distance metric between two columns of a matrix.

Note that the indexes are *1* based (not 0) as that is Newmat's convention. Note that dist(M,i,j) must equal dist(M,j,i);

Parameters:
M - Matrix whose columns represent individual items to be clustered.
col1Ix - Column index to be compared (1 based).
col2Ix - Column index to be compared (1 based).
Returns:
- "Distance" or "dissimilarity" metric between two columns of matrix.

Reimplemented in CorrelationMetric, GuassianRadial, AngleMetric, and ExpAngleMetric.
